doc:
Emma Pierson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emma_Pierson 0 Emma Jane Pierson (born 30 April 1981) is an English actress. She is best known for her role as Anna Thornton-Wilton in the BBC television drama Hotel Babylon. Pierson has appeared in many television programmes, including SunTrap, Days Like These, Beast, I Saw You, Charles II: The Power and The Passion, The Worst Week of My Life, Bloodlines, Coupling and Time Gentlemen Please. Her more recent projects include the film Lives of the Saints and the BBC Three comedy Dead Boss. Emma_Jane_Pierson ( born_30_April_1981 ) is an_English_actress . She is_best_known for her_role as Anna_Thornton-Wilton in the_BBC_television_drama_Hotel_Babylon . Pierson has_appeared in many_television_programmes , including SunTrap , Days Like These , Beast , I Saw You , Charles_II : The_Power and The_Passion , The_Worst_Week of My_Life , Bloodlines , Coupling and Time_Gentlemen_Please . Her_more_recent_projects include the_film_Lives of the_Saints and the_BBC_Three_comedy_Dead_Boss .
